node1.PC_Text: Good afternoon Mike. May I have a moment of your time please?
node1.NPC_Response: Sure, what can I do for you Annie?

node1.PC_Text: Hey Mike. Can I have a second? I need a favor.
node1.NPC_Response: What can I do for you?

node1.PC_Text: Hey boss man, answer me this question.

A.PC_Text: Could you show me how to do my timesheet?
A.NPC_Response: You should talk to Fran. She can help you with that better than I can.

A.PC_Text: Can I have a new stapler?
A.NPC_Response: Is there something wrong with the one you have?

A.PC_Text: You need to get me a new chair. One of those ergonomic ones, preferably. This medieval torture device of a chair is killing my back.
A.NPC_Response: You can submit a request to Human Resources.

B.PC_Text: Would you mind if we push the Thursday meeting back 30 minutes?
Could you accept my Facebook friend invite? I sent it last night.
Can you help me move this weekend?

C.PC_Text: Sorry. Might you be able to recommend a good sushi place in the area?
C.NPC_Response: There's a place on 4th and Union called Sushi Sushi that's pretty good.

C.PC_Text: Can you get me tickets to a broadway show? I've never been to one before!
C.NPC_Response: No but why don't you buy tickets on your own.

C.PC_Text: You seriously need to read this screenplay I wrote. Could you get me feedback by next week?
C.NPC_Response: I'm sorry but that's really not my area of expertise.

AA.PC_Text: Fran's been in the bathroom for like, 20 minutes. I'll just wait here until she comes back.
Gotcha chief. Boss man delegating work to his minions. Like a boss.
AA.NPC_Response: No, really. Fran is a better resource for this.

AB.NPC_Response: I'll see what I can do.

AB.PC_Text: It's black. My last stapler was purple and I really liked that.
AB.NPC_Response: Uh, well I am not sure we have any purple staplers.

AB.PC_Text: It's black. What's the point of having an office job if you don't get a red Swingline stapler?

AC.PC_Text: Ok, but my bad back is on you until the new chair arrives.
You have an ergonomic chair, can I just have that?

BA.PC_Text: I have an appointment right before and I don't want to be late to our meeting.
That way it starts on the hour, not the half hour.
It's really early in the morning and my brain might not be firing on all cylinders just then.
BA.NPC_Response: It sounds like you need to manage your sleep better.

BB.PC_Text: But you have a profile, I found it!
BB.NPC_Response: Must be another Mike at Acme Tech.

BB.PC_Text: But I want to invite you to a party this weekend and need to send you the details!

BC.PC_Text: Oh, ok. It was worth a shot.
No worries. I'll just take a sick day Friday so I can start packing.
BC.NPC_Response: That's not how sick days work.

BC.PC_Text: What if I just borrowed your car instead?

CA.PC_Text: Sushi Sushi? Wonder what they serve there... Ha!
Great. Pull out your calendar and we can schedule a time after work to meet up and chat!
CA.NPC_Response: I did not agree to this…

CB.PC_Text: Oh well, no harm in asking!
But they would be more special coming from you.
CB.NPC_Response: That's sweet, but the answer is still no.

CB.PC_Text: I've seen your Porsche How about if you buy tickets for the both of us and we can go together?  *wink wink nudge nudge*
CB.NPC_Response: I don’t think my wife would be happy about that.

CC.PC_Text: Nothing major, just let me know what you think.
It's only 190 pages, shouldn't take too long to get through.
It's the story of an up-and-coming career woman finding her way through the male-dominated business-acquisitions scene. Don't steal the idea!
